attributes.additional_details: we are a village that have roads that looks like we have been bombed NO money has been spent here in 16 years we pay our taxes and don`t get anything done please look into essex council and tell them we need them repaired

rejection.details: The local roads in your village are, as your petition notes, a matter for Essex County Council; and your petition calls on central government to look into the matter.  However, your petition does not mention the name of the village!  Please resubmit.
